net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.handler

Class ClientSideHandlerScriptRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.handler.ClientSideHandlerScriptRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ClientSideHandlerScriptRequestHandler
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Handles requests for the client side script used in non dynamic html pages.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • handleClientSideHandlerRequest

        public void handleClientSideHandlerRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Generates a locale dependent script used to include bundles in non dynamic html pages. Uses a cache of said scripts to avoid constant regeneration. It also keeps track of eTags and if-modified-since headers to take advantage of client side caching.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        response - the response
